" NAVAL STAFF (Trade JDivision), ADMIRALTY, 1st January 1918. The following lists contain particulars of all British Merchant and Fishing Vesselscaptured, destroyed, damaged, or molested by the enemy from the outbreak of War tothe last day of July 1917. The continuation of these lists from 1st August 1917 is contained in Volume II., andAddenda which may become necessaiy to any of the particulars in Volume I. willlie found in Volume II. Volume I. should be retained, as it will not be reprinted. Vessels armed for offensive purposes are not included in these lists. Unless other-wise stated, all bearings given are magnetic. Grew and civilian passengers only areincluded in column headed " Lives lost." I.
